text: “Work isn’t a place to be happy!” 😱😱😱😱 seems to  have been heard in Switzerland. @holly_cummins #FlowCon #FlowCon19 luckily at @aSparkFR it is exactly the opposite around. #Fullplaisir https://t.co/PC0paKhvdn
